page.title: 18Shops in Marchwood
page.content: {Marchwood does not have many shops} although its population has almost doubled to 4000 in the past 15 years.However thare are two general stores, a post office,a butcher, a hardware store, an off-license and a ladies' hairdresser.The general store sells everything from groceries to stationery. Because of the lack of shops many people go to Totton or Southampton to do their shopping.At the moment a new larger shopping centre is being built near the new school.There will be a supermarket and six other new shops with car parking facilities for about 120 cars.At the moment there is no proper car park in the village. With so many new houses being built in Marchwood, even more shops will be needed soon.
